Title: Relates to designating a portion of the state highway system as the 9-11 Fallen Firefighter Memorial Highway
Summary: Designates a portion of the Long Island Expressway as the "9-11 Fallen Firefighter Memorial Highway".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "9-11 Fallen Firefighter Memorial Highway"
